data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=65ZUnXuYoysQ7kNvgGKUoTr&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAUYEyT-IAPpTmYNvIul0dTHNRnvUG0mxoTiDg1aKlB4Q&oe=664B0FCC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=P1d84MOYoXQQ7kNvgGuSXLV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCGocznuiW_taSYslY0Ol3lFzelneiaV_cubIcQ6CmPFA&oe=664B461F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035339_749541023684513_3682281630778817377_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hQo2LI6w2T8Q7kNvgHhRj16&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCjnUJ2KLXqlmrBBhgQKPyTWl-iFaetRZ5IwAherw4Lpw&oe=664B44A4)
